info.title: International Trade Administration Trade Events API
info.description: The Trade Events API provides data on events for U.S. businesses interested in selling their products and services overseas. These events include industry conferences, webinars, lectures and trade missions organized by the U.S. Dept. of Commerce. Developers can use this API to keep businesses aware of the latest events in their industry or location.

get.description: This API provides metadata for country and industry reports that are produced by ITAs trade experts and are available in ITAs online market research library.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns office locations based on ISO alpha-2 country codes.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Returns market research reports for a specific industry.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Returns market research reports for a match in the description or title fields.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the maximum amount of hits to be returned.

get.description: This API provides contact and address information for all of ITAs domestic and international export assistance centers.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Returns office locations based on city name

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns office locations based on ISO alpha-2 country codes.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Returns office locations for a match within the post or office name fields.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the maximum amount of hits to be returned.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Returns locations for export assistance centers located in a specific U.S. State or Dependent Area.

get.description: Provides information on industry conferences, webinars, lectures and trade missions organized by the U.S. Dept. of Commerce

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns office locations based on ISO alpha-2 country codes.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Searches for specific controlled industry names

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Searches for a match within the event_name and description fields.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the maximum amount of hits to be returned.
